```{r echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
xfun::pkg_attach("tidyverse", "magrittr")

pubs <- readxl::read_xlsx("data/publikace.xlsx", col_types = "text") |>
  mutate(
    Pages = str_replace(Pages, "-", "–"),
    Year = as.integer(Year)
    )  |>
  arrange(desc(Year))

# Split into two groups
articles <- pubs |> filter(`Item Type` == "journalArticle")
chapters <- pubs |> filter(`Item Type` == "bookSection")

# Helper: link builder
make_link <- function(title, url, doi) {
  ifelse(!is.na(url), 
         str_glue("[{title}]({url})"),
         ifelse(!is.na(doi),
                str_glue("[{title}](https://doi.org/{doi})"),
                title))
}

make_pdf <- function(link) {
  ifelse(!is.na(link), 
         str_glue(" [[pdf]({link})]"),
         "")
}
make_bo <- function(link) {
  ifelse(!is.na(link), 
         str_glue(" [[Beck-online]({link})]"),
         "")
}

# ---- Style 1: Journal Articles ----
article_items <- articles |>
  mutate(
    # entry = paste0(Author, Title, `Publication Title`)
    entry = str_glue("
     - {Author}. {make_link(Title, Url, DOI)}. *{`Publication Title`}*, {Year}, č. {Issue}, str. {Pages}. {make_pdf(Fulltext)} {make_bo(BO)}
     ")
  )

# ---- Style 2: Book Chapters ----
chapter_items <- chapters |>
  mutate(
    entry = str_glue("- {Author}. *{Title}*. In: {`Book Author`}. *{make_link(`Publication Title`, Url, DOI)}*. {Place}: {Publisher}, {Year}, str. {Pages}. {make_pdf(Fulltext)}")
  )

# Print sections
cat("### Články\n\n")
cat(article_items$entry, sep="\n")

cat("\n\n### Příspěvky ve sbornících, kapitoly v knihách\n\n")
cat(chapter_items$entry, sep="\n")

```
